#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
        
        string s;
        char c;
        int i,t,s1;
 
        scanf("%d",&t);
 
        getchar();
 
        while(t--)
        {
                cin>>s;
 
                for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
                {
                        
                        s1=0;
                        if(s[i]== '1')
                        {
                                s1 = 100 + (s[++i]-'0')*10;
                                s1 += (s[++i]-'0');
                                printf("%c",s1);
                        }
 
                        else
                        {
                                
                                s1=(s[i]-'0')*10;
                                s1+=(s[++i]-'0');
                                printf("%c",s1);
                        }
                }
 
                printf("\n");
 
        }
 
 
        return(0);
 
}
